description: The system's architecture is structured around a pipeline that begins with the Static Analyzer. This component is responsible for in-depth code analysis, leveraging an LSP Client for language-specific insights and an Ignore Utility to precisely control the scope of its operations. The "interpreted results" from the Static Analyzer are then passed to the Orchestration Engine, which acts as an intermediary, preparing the data for the final output stage. The Output Generation Engine serves as the central coordinator for documentation generation, dispatching the processed insights to various specialized generators, including the HTML Generator, Markdown Generator, MDX Generator, and Sphinx Generator. The HTML Generator further relies on an HTML Template Processor to ensure consistent styling and structure in its output. This modular design ensures a clear separation of concerns, from code analysis and scope management to the final rendering of diverse documentation formats.

components.name: Static Analyzer
components.description: Responsible for analyzing source code and generating "interpreted results." It integrates with LSP clients for language-specific analysis and uses an ignore mechanism to control the scope of its operations.

components.name: LSP Client
components.description: Facilitates communication between the Static Analyzer and Language Server Protocols to perform detailed code analysis.

components.name: Ignore Utility
components.description: Manages rules for including or excluding files and directories from the Static Analyzer's processing scope.

components.name: Orchestration Engine
components.description: Receives "interpreted results" from the Static Analyzer, performs further processing, and prepares them for output generation.

components.name: Output Generation Engine
components.description: The primary entry point for the subsystem, coordinating the selection and execution of specific format generators based on the desired output type.

components.name: HTML Generator
components.description: Transforms architectural insights into well-structured HTML documentation.

components.name: HTML Template Processor
components.description: Manages and applies HTML templates to the data provided by the HTML Generator.

components.name: Markdown/MDX/Sphinx Generators
components.description: Convert architectural insights into Markdown, MDX, or Sphinx-compatible formats.

components.name: Unclassified
components.description: Component for all unclassified files and utility functions (Utility functions/External Libraries/Dependencies)
